LightningComponentBundle.description: Multi-Level Navigation Menu for Community Cloud

property.name: nameFilter
property.label: Name Filter
property.description: If above Menu option is set to [Name Filter], set a value to match a menu's name on. If multiple menus match, the most recently created one will be returned. Merge fields from community pages can be used here, such as: {!recordId}, {!recordName}, {!urlParameter} - to create dynamic, page-specific menus.

property.name: menuMode
property.label: Menu Mode
property.description: Default Drop Down Menu that keeps all items open, or Drill Down that hides other menu items except what is currently active.

property.name: verticalMode
property.label: Vertical Mode
property.description: On to force vertical mode always, off to never render vertical mode, mobile only to render on mobile.

property.name: hamburgerMenuMode
property.label: Hamburger Menu Mode
property.description: Mode for when to hide menu behind hamburger. Defaults to 'mobile-only' which will render a hamburger menu only on mobile devices. 'on' will render a hamburger menu all the time. 'off' will never render a hamburger menu. Hamburger menu will take precedence over vertical mode.

property.name: language
property.label: Language Filter
property.description: Choose language to filter menu on. If 'auto' is chosen, for unauthenticated / guest users the language is populated based on the language picker component ('language' url parameter), otherwise for authenticated users the language is based on their language / locale selection in their user settings. If translation is not needed, leave the default 'none' value.

property.name: overflowLabel
property.label: Overflow Label
property.description: Text to display for the overflow menu item.

property.name: drillDownBackButtonLabel
property.label: DrillDown Back Label
property.description: Label to display for the back button in drill down menu.

property.name: allLabel
property.label: DrillDown Go To Label
property.description: Label to display for going to menu item that has children and is linked.

property.name: brandNavigationColorText
property.label: Override Navigation Text Color
property.description: Override the Navigation Text Color token that is inherited from the theme with this value.

property.name: brandNavigationBarBackgroundColor
property.label: Override Navigation Bar Background Color
property.description: Override the Navigation Bar Background Color token that is inherited from the theme with this value.

property.name: brandNavigationBackgroundColor
property.label: Override Navigation Background Color
property.description: Override the Navigation Background Color token that is inherited from the theme with this value.

property.name: fontFamily
property.label: Override Font Family
property.description: Override the Font Family token that is inherited from the theme with this value.

property.name: textTransform
property.label: Override Text Case
property.description: Override the Text Case token that is inherited from the theme with this value.

property.name: topLevelItemSpacing
property.label: Top Level Item Spacing
property.description: Set spacing in pixels between Top Level Menu Items.

property.name: navMenuClassNames
property.label: Menu Style Classes
property.description: Class names to uniquely target a menu's styles.

property.name: urlSubMapJson
property.label: URL Substition Map JSON
property.description: Define JSON substitution map as such (Example): [{ "replaceThis": "[!recordId]", "replaceWith": "{!recordId}" }]
